title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: In build 200201151, when searching for references to a field in an external jar, the search results are not being selected. This issue can be reproduced by performing the following steps: Search for references to the field.
OB: When searching for references to the field in the external jar, the search results are not being selected.
EB: In the method getTempDir(), you should get 3 matches when searching for references to this field.
SR:
1. Open the project in build 200201151.
2. Perform a search for references to the field in the external jar.
3. Observe that the search results are not being selected.
